verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, lover of my soul, newline Let me to Thy bosom fly, newline While the billows near me roll, newline While the tempest still is high; newline Hide me, O my Saviour, hide! newline Till the storm of life is past; newline Safe into the haven guide, newline O receive my soul at last!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Other refuge have I none, newline Hangs my helpless soul on Thee; newline Leave, O leave me not alone! newline Still support and comfort me; newline All my trust on Thee is stayed, newline All my help from Thee I bring; newline Cover my defenseless head newline With the shadow of Thy wing.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thou, O Christ, art all I want, newline More than all in Thee I find; newline Raise the fallen, cheer the faint, newline Heal the sick, and lead the blind. newline Just and holy is Thy name, newline I am all unrighteousness; newline Vile and full of sin I am, newline Thou art full of truth and grace.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Plenteous grace with Thee is found newline Grace to pardon all my sin; newline Let the healing streams abound, newline Make and keep me pure within; newline Thou of life the Fountain art, newline Freely let me take of Thee; newline Spring Thou up within my heart, newline Rise to all eternity.
